name: Addon Control Panel
description: It allows you to manage your addons in game, with an interface which looks similar to the blizzard addon manager.

name: Armory
description: All armory information as (once) seen on the official site from Blizzard Entertainment, in game, for all your characters, on all realms.

name: Auctioneer
description: A suite that provides you with the tools and data necessary to make those difficult auctioning decisions with ease.

name: Auto Repair
description: Automaticaly repairs all your items when you visit a vendor with repair ability.

name: Bagnon
description: Bagnon merges all of your bags into three windows: inventory, bank and guild bank.

name: Deadly Boss Mods
description: Useful in a way that it alerts you on when a Boss begins to cast certain spells or use certain skills, so that you know when to move, counter, stop damage, run away, etc.

name: Fishing Buddy
description: Keeps track of the fish you catch and helps manage your fishing gear.

name: Gear Score
description: Addon that allows you to see Gearscore

name: Grid
description: A party/raid unit frame addon. A compact grid of units lets you select a group member quickly, while retaining a good overview of the whole group.

name: GTFO
description: Provides an audible alert when you're standing in something you're not supposed to be standing in.

name: Quest Helper
description: Questhelper tells you how to finish your quests in the easiest, fastest manner. It includes a database of quests, monsters, and items, telling you the exact location of that dang Perfect Satyr Horn you can't find. It also computes the fastest path to complete all your quests - and gain experience - as quickly as possible.

name: Raid Roll
description: Can be used to perform a raid roll. A raid roll lists all players with an ID beside their name. Then it performs a roll and announces who the winner is (based on the ID)

name: Recount
description: Allows you to view many statistics about your Party / Raid Group such as Overall Healing, Damage and DPS in a detailed fashion.

name: Sell-O-Matic
description: As simple as going near a merchant and opening their trade window, then you can click on the sell button (money icon). By default it will sell all gray items and use no sell or save list.

name: Titan Panel
description: Adds one or two information bars on the top and/or bottom of the screen and allows a framework for extensive plugin support.

name: Wow Instant Messenger
description: WIM helps you to manage your whispers by making them into a classic instant messenger interface such as AIM, Yahoo and MSN.

name: XLoot
description: Providing a large array of options to change how loot is presented, as well as allowing you to use Masque or ButtonFacade Skins, XLoot's job is to make looting more functional while still having a better form.
